name: In re Thomas J. ESHELMAN, Candidate for Supreme Court of Pennsylvania

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: In re Thomas J. ESHELMAN, Candidate for Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
attorneys: C. Kent Price, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Lawrence J. Hracho, William R. Bernhart, Reading, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
458 A.2d 1350
In re Thomas J. ESHELMAN, Candidate for Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 20, 1983.
Decided April 20, 1983.
C. Kent Price, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Lawrence J. Hracho, William R. Bernhart, Reading, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
